src/newtonERP/orm/associations/PluralAccessorManager.java

00001 package newtonERP.orm.associations;
00002 
00003 import java.util.HashSet;
00004 import java.util.Hashtable;
00005 import java.util.TreeMap;
00006 import java.util.Vector;
00007 
00008 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00009 import newtonERP.module.generalEntity.FlagPool;
00010 import newtonERP.module.generalEntity.ListOfValue;
00011 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00012 
00017 public class PluralAccessorManager
00018 {

00024         public static final TreeMap<String, PluralAccessor> getPluralAccessorList(
00025                         AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00026         {
00027                 TreeMap<String, PluralAccessor> pluralAccessorList = new TreeMap<String, PluralAccessor>();
00028 
00029                 addFromPositiveFlagPoolList(pluralAccessorList, entity);
00030                 addFromNegativeListOfValueList(pluralAccessorList, entity);
00031                 addFromNegativeFlagPoolList(pluralAccessorList, entity);
00032 
00033                 return pluralAccessorList;
00034         }
00035 
00043         public static PluralAccessor getPluralAccessor(AbstractOrmEntity entity,
00044                         String accessorName, AbstractOrmEntity searchCriteriaEntity)
00045 
00046         {
00047                 PluralAccessor pluralAccessor;
00048 
00049                 TreeMap<String, PluralAccessor> pluralAccessorList = new TreeMap<String, PluralAccessor>();
00050 
00051                 pluralAccessor = tryGetAccessorFromPositiveFlagPool(entity,
00052                                 accessorName, searchCriteriaEntity);
00053 
00054                 if (pluralAccessor != null)
00055                         return pluralAccessor;
00056 
00057                 addFromNegativeListOfValueList(pluralAccessorList, entity);
00058 
00059                 if (pluralAccessorList.containsKey(accessorName))
00060                         return pluralAccessorList.get(accessorName);
00061 
00062                 addFromNegativeFlagPoolList(pluralAccessorList, entity);
00063 
00064                 if (pluralAccessorList.containsKey(accessorName))
00065                         return pluralAccessorList.get(accessorName);
00066 
00067                 String availableAccessorList = "";
00068 
00069                 for (String currentAccessorName : pluralAccessorList.keySet())
00070                         availableAccessorList += currentAccessorName + " ";
00071 
00072                 availableAccessorList = availableAccessorList.trim();
00073 
00074                 if (pluralAccessorList.size() > 0)
00075                         throw new RuntimeException(
00076                                         "Accesseur introuvable. Veuillez utiliser un des accesseurs suivant dans ce contexte: "
00077                                                         + availableAccessorList);
00078                 throw new RuntimeException(
00079                                 "Aucun accesseur disponible dans ce contexte");
00080         }
00081 
00087         public static final PluralAccessor getPluralAccessor(
00088                         AbstractOrmEntity entity, String accessorName)
00089         {
00090                 return getPluralAccessor(entity, accessorName, null);
00091         }
00092 
00093         private static void addFromNegativeFlagPoolList(
00094                         TreeMap<String, PluralAccessor> pluralAccessorList,
00095                         AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00096         {
00097                 PluralAccessor intermediatePluralAccessor;
00098                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> resultSet;
00099                 PluralAccessor pluralAccessor;
00100                 AbstractOrmEntity intermediateEntityDefinition;
00101                 FlagPool flagPool;
00102 
00103                 for (String flagPoolName : entity.getNegativeFlagPoolList().keySet())
00104                 {
00105                         flagPool = entity.getNegativeFlagPoolList().get(flagPoolName);
00106 
00107                         if (entity.getClass() != flagPool.getForeignEntityDefinition()
00108                                         .getClass())
00109                                 continue;
00110 
00111                         // On skip la gestion des flag pool pas concernés
00112                         if (!flagPool.getIntermediateEntityDefinition().getFields()
00113                                         .containsFieldName(entity.getForeignKeyName()))
00114                                 continue;
00115 
00116                         try
00117                         {
00118                                 intermediateEntityDefinition = flagPool
00119                                                 .getIntermediateEntityDefinition().getClass()
00120                                                 .newInstance();
00121                         } catch (InstantiationException e)
00122                         {
00123                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00124                         } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00125                         {
00126                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00127                         }
00128                         intermediateEntityDefinition.initFields();
00129 
00130                         intermediateEntityDefinition.setData(entity.getForeignKeyName(),
00131                                         entity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00132 
00133                         intermediatePluralAccessor = new PluralAccessor(
00134                                         intermediateEntityDefinition, Orm
00135                                                         .select(intermediateEntityDefinition));
00136 
00137                         pluralAccessor = null;
00138                         for (AbstractOrmEntity intermediateEntity : intermediatePluralAccessor)
00139                         {
00140                                 String keyOut = flagPool.getIntermediateKeyIn();
00141                                 AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntity = flagPool
00142                                                 .getSourceEntityDefinition();
00143                                 try
00144                                 {
00145                                         foreignEntity = foreignEntity.getClass().newInstance();
00146                                 } catch (InstantiationException e)
00147                                 {
00148                                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00149                                 } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00150                                 {
00151                                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00152                                 }
00153                                 foreignEntity.initFields();
00154                                 foreignEntity.setData(foreignEntity.getPrimaryKeyName(),
00155                                                 intermediateEntity.getData(keyOut));
00156 
00157                                 resultSet = Orm.select(foreignEntity);
00158 
00159                                 if (pluralAccessor == null)
00160                                         pluralAccessor = new PluralAccessor(foreignEntity);
00161 
00162                                 if (resultSet.size() > 0)
00163                                         pluralAccessor.addAll(resultSet);
00164                         }
00165 
00166                         if (flagPool.getSourceEntityDefinition().getClass() != entity
00167                                         .getClass())
00168                                 pluralAccessorList.put(flagPool.getSourceEntityDefinition()
00169                                                 .getNaturalKeyName(), pluralAccessor);
00170                 }
00171         }
00172 
00173         private static void addFromNegativeListOfValueList(
00174                         TreeMap<String, PluralAccessor> pluralAccessorList,
00175                         AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00176         {
00177                 // searchCriteriaEntity can be null
00178 
00179                 AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntityDefinition;
00180 
00181                 for (ListOfValue listOfValue : new HashSet<ListOfValue>(entity
00182                                 .getNegativeListOfValueList()))
00183                 {
00184                         if (!entity.getSystemName().equals(
00185                                         listOfValue.getForeignEntityDefinition().getSystemName()))
00186                                 continue;
00187 
00188                         try
00189                         {
00190                                 foreignEntityDefinition = listOfValue
00191                                                 .getSourceEntityDefinition().getClass().newInstance();
00192                         } catch (InstantiationException e)
00193                         {
00194                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00195                         } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00196                         {
00197                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00198                         }
00199                         foreignEntityDefinition.initFields();
00200 
00201                         if (!foreignEntityDefinition.getFields().containsFieldName(
00202                                         entity.getForeignKeyName()))
00203                                 continue;
00204 
00205                         foreignEntityDefinition.setData(entity.getForeignKeyName(), entity
00206                                         .getPrimaryKeyValue());
00207 
00208                         Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> resultSet = Orm
00209                                         .select(foreignEntityDefinition);
00210 
00211                         pluralAccessorList.put(foreignEntityDefinition.getSystemName(),
00212                                         new PluralAccessor(foreignEntityDefinition, resultSet));
00213                 }
00214         }
00215 
00216         private static void addFromPositiveFlagPoolList(
00217                         TreeMap<String, PluralAccessor> pluralAccessorList,
00218                         AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00219         {
00220                 PluralAccessor pluralAccessor;
00221                 FlagPool flagPool;
00222 
00223                 for (String flagPoolName : entity.getPositiveFlagPoolList().keySet())
00224                 {
00225                         flagPool = entity.getPositiveFlagPoolList().get(flagPoolName);
00226                         pluralAccessor = getPositivePluralAccessor(entity, flagPool, null);
00227 
00228                         if (pluralAccessor != null)
00229                                 pluralAccessorList.put(flagPool.getForeignEntityDefinition()
00230                                                 .getSystemName(), pluralAccessor);
00231                 }
00232         }
00233 
00234         private static PluralAccessor tryGetAccessorFromPositiveFlagPool(
00235                         AbstractOrmEntity entity, String accessorName,
00236                         AbstractOrmEntity searchCriteriaEntity)
00237         {
00238                 // searchCriteriaEntity can be null
00239 
00240                 accessorName = accessorName.toLowerCase();
00241                 PluralAccessor pluralAccessor;
00242 
00243                 Hashtable<String, FlagPool> positiveFlagPoolList = entity
00244                                 .getPositiveFlagPoolList();
00245 
00246                 FlagPool selectedFlagPool = null;
00247 
00248                 for (FlagPool currentFlagPool : positiveFlagPoolList.values())
00249                 {
00250                         if (currentFlagPool.getForeignEntityDefinition().getSystemName()
00251                                         .toLowerCase().equals(accessorName))
00252                         {
00253                                 selectedFlagPool = currentFlagPool;
00254                                 break;
00255                         }
00256                         else if (currentFlagPool.getForeignEntityDefinition()
00257                                         .getPrimaryKeyName().toLowerCase().equals(accessorName))
00258                         {
00259                                 selectedFlagPool = currentFlagPool;
00260                                 break;
00261                         }
00262                         else if (currentFlagPool.getForeignEntityDefinition()
00263                                         .getForeignKeyName().toLowerCase().equals(accessorName))
00264                         {
00265                                 selectedFlagPool = currentFlagPool;
00266                                 break;
00267                         }
00268                 }
00269 
00270                 if (selectedFlagPool == null)
00271                         selectedFlagPool = positiveFlagPoolList.get(accessorName);
00272 
00273                 if (selectedFlagPool == null)
00274                         return null;
00275 
00276                 pluralAccessor = getPositivePluralAccessor(entity, selectedFlagPool,
00277                                 searchCriteriaEntity);
00278 
00279                 return pluralAccessor;
00280         }
00281 
00282         private static PluralAccessor getPositivePluralAccessor(
00283                         AbstractOrmEntity entity, FlagPool flagPool,
00284                         AbstractOrmEntity searchCriteriaEntity)
00285         {
00286                 // searchCriteriaEntity can be null
00287 
00288                 flagPool.query(entity.getPrimaryKeyName(), entity.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00289 
00290                 return flagPool.getPositivePluralForeignAccessor(searchCriteriaEntity);
00291         }
00292 }
